entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 13. POP 30%
